body: An 11-year-old boy was hit by a car and badly injured while crossing a Brooklyn street around 6 p.m. yesterday, the police said. The accident took place near Liberty and North Conduit Avenues in the City Line neighborhood. Witnesses said the boy was crossing the street with his bicycle, accompanied by another boy when he was hit. ''I heard a noise
title: A Boy, 11, Is Struck by a Car in Brooklyn

body: A 17-year-old boy was killed and a 23-year-old man was critically injured when their Nissan sedan hit a light pole on North Conduit Avenue near Sutter Avenue in City Line about 1 a.m. yesterday, the police said. The driver of the car, Ramchand Hansraj, 35, fled the scene of the accident and was later charged with vehicular manslaughter, assault and
title: Metro Briefing | New York: Queens: Driver Charged In Fatal Crash

body: OF all the lessons to emerge from the Jack Abramoff scandal, the most culturally consequential may be just three words long. And it is already being taught as part of an ethics training session for special agents at the F.B.I. title: The Muddying of the Greens
